text: Gabriela Alejandra Guzm치n Pinal (born February 9, 1968), known professionally as Alejandra Guzm치n, and nicknamed "La Reina de Corazones" (The Queen of Hearts) is a Mexican musician, singer, composer, and actress. She won a Latin Grammy. She is one of the most successful Mexican female singers. She is the daughter of actress Silvia Pinal and singer Enrique Guzm치n. ==References== Category:1968 births Category:Living people Category:Singers from Mexico City Category:Musicians from Mexico City Category:Mexican movie actors Category:Mexican television actors Category:Writers from Mexico City Category:Mexican voice actors
